## Plant data sources
:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="30%"}
![](materials/images/gbif-logo.png)
:::

::: {.column width="70%"}
```{=html}
<br>
```
[Digital aggregator of occurrence data](https://www.gbif.org/occurrence/search?taxon_key=7707728&advanced=1&occurrence_status=present)
:::

::::
```{r gbif-map}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| out-height: "0.8%"
#| layout-align: center
#| layout-valign: center
library(rgbif)
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(raster)
library(dplyr)
library(scico)

key <- name_backbone("tracheophyta")$usageKey
map <- map_fetch(taxonKey=key, basisOfRecord="PRESERVED_SPECIMEN", srs="EPSG:3857",
                 style="purpleYellow.point")
crs(map) <- crs("EPSG:3857")

url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tdwg/wgsrpd/master/geojson/level3.geojson"
countries <- 
  url |>
  st_read(quiet=TRUE)

map |>
  projectRaster(crs=crs("WGS84")) |>
  as.data.frame(xy=TRUE) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_raster(mapping=aes(x=x, y=y, fill=layer), show.legend=FALSE) +
  geom_sf(data=countries, fill=NA, colour="white", size=1) +
  coord_sf() +
  scale_fill_scico(palette="batlowK", na.value="black") +
  labs(x="", y="") +
  theme_void()
```

```{r wcvp-map}
#| layout-align: center
#| layout-valign: center
accepted_species <- 
  rWCVPdata::wcvp_names |>
  filter(taxon_rank == "Species", taxon_status == "Accepted") |>
  filter(is.na(species_hybrid), is.na(genus_hybrid))

richness <-
  rWCVPdata::wcvp_distributions |>
  filter(plant_name_id %in% accepted_species$plant_name_id) |>
  count(area_code_l3)

countries |>
  left_join(
    richness,
    by=c("LEVEL3_COD"="area_code_l3"),
    relationship="one-to-one"
  ) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(mapping=aes(fill=n)) +
  scale_fill_scico(palette="batlowK", name="Species richness",
                   labels=scales::label_number(suffix="K", scale=1e-3)) +
  guides(fill=guide_colorbar(title.position="top", barwidth=12, barheight=0.5)) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(
    legend.position="bottom"
  )
```

## Predicting Extinction risk
### Coarse-grained
* Multi-level Regression with Post-stratification [(MRP) using checklist data](https://github.com/barnabywalker/sotwp2020_extinction_risk/tree/master)

## Predicting Extinction risk
### Fine-grained
* [Various machine learning models](https://github.com/barnabywalker/guidelines-for-automated-assessments) using occurrence data

## Deep learning for herbarium specimens
### [Representation learning](https://github.com/barnabywalker/deep-delimitation)

* Aim: generalised embeddings useful for classification, image search, outlier detection, etc.

* [Comparing effect of training methods](https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fpls.2021.806407/full)

* Used [Weights & Biases](https://wandb.ai/barnabywalker/species-delimitation?workspace=user-barnabywalker) to track experiments

## Deep learning for herbarium specimens
### [Specimen segmentation](https://github.com/barnabywalker/specimen-masking)

* Separate specimen from the rest of sheet

* Used a pretrained model to get "rough" set of masks

* Corrected in Label Studio
